title: Are instructional technology and educational technology the same? - Quora

response.answer_text: My take: on principle, no; in practice, yes. Instructional technology is about (not surprisingly), instruction: designed interventions to achieve learning outcomes. Educational technology could support self- and informal learning (e.g. resources), and instruction management, as well. However, for most conversations they’re roughly equivalent, being about developing, delivering, and supporting learning experiences.
